p:
We fit simulations to three types of observed MERS-CoV epidemiological data. First, we use the cumulative number of index cases reported during the Apr-Oct 2013 study period, which is the number of cases progressing to the I
i compartment in our model and follows equation C
i ( t) (Text S1). Second, we use the cumulative number of secondary symptomatic community cases, which is the number of cases progressing to the I
s compartment in our model and follows equations C
s ( t). Lastly, we consider the cumulative number of symptomatic secondary cases that are generated by hospitalized patients, including inpatients, health care workers, and visitors of hospital patients, which is given by equation C
IH ( t) in our model.
